testCaseName: Select and apply specific age range filter
objective: To ensure users can filter demographic data by a specific age range
preconditions: User is logged into the ALZ-NET Dashboard
User is on the Explore Data Page

testData.expectedResult: Demographic data for ages between 27 and 50 is displayed
Demographic data for age 27 only is displayed
Demographic data for age 50 only is displayed
Demographic data for ages between 18 and 99 is displayed
Error or no results; min age below allowed boundary
Error or no results; max age above allowed boundary

testData.description: Min age greater than max age
testData.expectedResult: Error message: Min age cannot be greater than max age
Error message: Please enter a valid number for min age
Error message: Please enter a valid number for max age
Error message: Min age is required
Error message: Max age is required
Error message: Please enter a valid number for min age
Error message: Please enter a valid number for max age
No demographic data found for ages between 90 and 95

postConditions: Age range filter remains until user changes it
